values: Every Letter Kills, Including Shakespeare: Pressing Through Texts in the Power of the SpiritEvery Letter Kills, Including Shakespeare: Pressing Through Texts in the Power of the Spirit

To exposit a text is only one part of preaching and teaching. We must drill down into the words and unearth the reality that holds the text together.To exposit a text is only one part of preaching and teaching. We must drill down into the words and unearth the reality that holds the text together.
